comments.html:
EtherType? What do you mean EtherType?

There are/were 4 types of Ethernet encapsulation. Only one of them (arpa encaps) has an EtherType. The other 3 encapsulations do not have an EtherType field. You could have made this story a lot more complex and confusing. If you wanted. :) A missed opportunity. :)
comments.name: Henk
